name: Sci-Fi Screen
description: Memorable quotes from science fiction movies and television that shaped our imagination.
author: Quips Editorial

quotes.content: May the Force be with you.
quotes.notes: The franchise's signature blessing. First spoken by General Dodonna, but Obi-Wan made it iconic.

quotes.content: Do. Or do not. There is no try.
quotes.source: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
quotes.notes: Yoda's lesson to Luke about commitment. Frank Oz's puppetry brought the character to life.

quotes.source: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
quotes.notes: Cinema's greatest twist. Often misquoted as 'Luke, I am your father.' Kept secret even from most cast.

quotes.content: The Force will be with you. Always.
quotes.notes: Obi-Wan's parting message to Luke before the Death Star assault. A promise fulfilled across the saga.

quotes.content: I've got a bad feeling about this.
quotes.notes: Running joke in the franchise. Every Star Wars film contains a variation of this line.

quotes.source: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
quotes.notes: Han dismissing C-3PO's probability calculations. Defines Han's reckless confidence.
Mandalorian creed response. Became a cultural catchphrase from the Disney+ series.
Vulcan greeting with the split-finger salute. Nimoy based the gesture on a Jewish blessing.
Opening narration of the original series. Became Trek's mission statement for 50+ years.
Never actually said in this exact form. A cultural condensation of various transport requests.

quotes.content: The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few.
quotes.source: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
quotes.notes: Spock's logical justification for his sacrifice. Kirk later reverses it in Search for Spock.
Borg collective's warning. First appeared in 'Q Who.' Became shorthand for overwhelming conformity.
Picard's command phrase. Stewart's Shakespearean delivery gave it gravitas.
Became Schwarzenegger's signature line. Used in many of his subsequent films.

quotes.content: Come with me if you want to live.
quotes.notes: Kyle's first words to Sarah. Later said by different characters in sequels.

quotes.content: I've seen things you people wouldn't believe.
quotes.notes: Beginning of Roy's 'tears in rain' monologue. Hauer partly improvised the speech.

quotes.content: All those moments will be lost in time, like tears in rain.
quotes.notes: Final line of Roy's death soliloquy. Hauer added 'like tears in rain' himself.
From the Bene Gesserit Litany Against Fear. Originally from Frank Herbert's 1965 novel.
Emphasizes spice's economic importance. David Lynch's film version popularized this phrasing.

quotes.content: He who controls the spice controls the universe.
quotes.notes: Encapsulates the novel's political themes. Spice as metaphor for oil is often discussed.

quotes.content: In space, no one can hear you scream.
quotes.notes: Marketing tagline that became iconic. Captures the isolation horror of the film.
Hudson's panicked outburst. Paxton's delivery made it quotable for generations.

quotes.content: Get away from her, you bitch!
quotes.notes: Ripley protecting Newt from the Queen. One of cinema's great action hero moments.
Morpheus showing Neo the truth. The red pill/blue pill choice became cultural shorthand.
Lesson about bending reality. Represents understanding that the Matrix isn't real.
Neo after his first training upload. Reeves' amazed delivery became iconic.

quotes.content: What is real? How do you define real?
quotes.notes: Morpheus questioning perception. Introduced philosophical concepts to mainstream audiences.

quotes.content: Roads? Where we're going, we don't need roads.
quotes.notes: Doc's closing line before the DeLorean flies. Sets up the sequel's promise.
Doc's exclamation of surprise. Lloyd's eccentric delivery defined the character.
E.T.'s request to contact his species. Spielberg's film became a cultural phenomenon.
Malcolm's chaos theory observation. Goldblum's unique delivery made it memorable.
Muldoon's last words, realizing the raptor's trap. Perfect blend of respect and doom.
Arnold before rebooting the park systems. One of Jackson's most quotable lines.
Colonial affirmation of unity. The 2004 series reinvented sci-fi television.
Mal's defiant declaration. Firefly fans made it a rallying cry for the cancelled series.
Jayne's enthusiastic agreement to a job. 'Shiny' became part of Firefly fan vocabulary.

quotes.content: I can't lie to you about your chances, but you have my sympathies.
quotes.notes: Ash's chilling final assessment. Reveals the android's true lack of humanity.

quotes.source: The Day the Earth Stood Still (1951)
quotes.notes: Command to stop Gort. Referenced in Army of Darkness and many other films.

quotes.content: Open the pod bay doors, HAL.
quotes.notes: Dave's request to the malfunctioning AI. Kubrick's film set the standard for sci-fi cinema.

quotes.content: I'm sorry, Dave. I'm afraid I can't do that.
quotes.notes: HAL's polite refusal became template for sinister AI. Rain's calm voice made it chilling.
